title: The Multi-Medium
description:
The Multi-Medium is a visually unique 2D puzzle- platformer adventure in which you play as an interdimensional explorer in the multiverse. The world is watching as you embark on a first-of-its-kind expedition to explore parallel universes , but something goes wrong there is a glitch in the technology and you canâ€™t get back home. Lost in the multiverse, you embark on a journey to find your place in each world and in the cosmos .
Jump, climb, swing, swim, toss, and grapple your way through 10 diverse universes, each with its own distinct art style, setting, and story. Each level of the game is painted or drawn in a different physical medium, scanned, then brought to life in the game. Absolutely no digital art was used in the making of the game. Osiris: New Dawn

system_requirements.Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
